feature.description: If specified, this feature renderer will not be rendered.
feature.markdownDescription: If specified, this feature renderer will not be rendered.

features.description: If specified, these feature renderers will not be rendered.
features.markdownDescription: If specified, these feature renderers will not be rendered.

type.description:
[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_feature_render)

Prevents certain [Feature Renderers](../../misc/extras/feature_renderers.md) (like the wool coat of a Sheep, the worn armor of a mob, etc.) from rendering on the entity that has the power.

Type ID: `origins:prevent_feature_render`

[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/prevent_feature_render)

Prevents certain [Feature Renderers](../../misc/extras/feature_renderers.md) (like the wool coat of a Sheep, the worn armor of a mob, etc.) from rendering on the entity that has the power.

Type ID: `origins:prevent_feature_render`
